task.title: How to Use the Projector
task.shortdesc: The projector is used to display a variety of things on the large screen at the front of the classroom.

step.cmd: Locate the remote that has the words "SANYO" on it. This remote is the only way to turn the projector on.
Press the large red button at the top right of the remote labled "ON/STANDBY" once.
step.info: The buttons on the remote labeled "computer","video", "s-video", and "component" are to switch between input sources.
step.stepresult: The screen will slowly begin to project a blue image. The screen will be at full display clarity after about 20 seconds.
